Name: Active
Description:
depends on a dedicated measurement packet stream and
      observations of the stream defined in [RFC7799]

Name: Passive
Description:
depends *solely* on observation of one or more
      existing packet streams defined in [RFC7799]

Name: Hybrid Type 1
Description:
obervations on one stream that combine both active
      and passive methods defined in [RFC7799]

Name: Hybrid Type 2
Description:
obervations on two or more streams that combine
        both active and passive methods defined in [RFC7799]
